rComments: Lectures were scattered, but loutlines were provided online. I made sense of the material by taking my own notes during lecture and then matching them up with the outlines, using outside sources to fill in any blanks. To study for exams, make sure to know ALL definitions, understand the graphs and charts in lecture. Find study buddy!

Horrific teacher. Teaches clear enough, but his exams and assignments have really confusing formats. Does not provide previous exams or review material. WILL ask slight questions on exams that weren't really gone over in class. Somehow turned really simple material to being complicated.

very approachable. knows what he's talking about. loves his family and showing off pretty alaska pictures. ask questions and go to office hours..he likes that. long midterm and final, but it's all in the lecture notes. very interactive labs to keep it interesting. he also brings a sense of humor to class so that's a plus.
Great professor with a really interesting class. His exams were really fair, he has a good sense of humor, and the class size is really small. Definitely take this class.
